member.name: T:RainbowTags.Components.RainbowTagController
member.summary: Controls the color rotation in tag sequences for players that have a rainbow tag.

member.name: P:RainbowTags.Components.RainbowTagController.Colors
member.summary: Gets or sets the colors in the sequence.

member.name: P:RainbowTags.Components.RainbowTagController.Interval
member.summary: Gets or sets the time, in seconds, between switching to the next color in a sequence.

member.name: P:RainbowTags.Config.TagInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the time, in seconds, between switching to the next color in a sequence.

member.name: P:RainbowTags.Config.Sequences
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of group names with their respective color sequences.

member.name: M:RainbowTags.EventHandlers.#ctor(RainbowTags.Plugin)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
